src:
Miswar Saputra Dipastikan Tak Diboyong ke Markas Tira Persikabo
06 Nov 2019, 20:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penjaga gawang Persebaya Surabaya, Miswar Saputra dipastikan tak diboyong ke markas PS Tira Persikabo. Sebab, kondisinya tak kunjung membaik, bahkan dia absen latihan untuk ketiga kalinya.
Kepastian itu disampaikan pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso usai memimpin latihan di Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo, Rabu (6/11/2019). Kiper asal Aceh tersebut akan ditinggal di Surabaya.
"Miswar tidak kami berangkatkan karena sampai hari ini kondisinya masih pusing-pusing, jadi tidak kami berangkatkan," kata Aji Santoso.
Tentu menurut arsitek asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang itu, ketidakhadiran Miswar menjadi tantangan tersendiri. Mengingat dia merupakan salah satu andalan di bawah mistar gawang.
"Tapi mudah-mudahan dengan kekuatan ini minimal kami bisa mendapatkan poin di sana (markas PS Tira Persikabo)," harap Aji.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Miswar Saputra Certainly Not Taken to the Tira Persikabo Headquarters
Nov 6, 2019, 20:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya goalkeeper, Miswar Saputra certainly not carried off to the headquarters of PS Tira Persikabo. Because, his condition never improved, he even missed training for the third time.
Certainty was delivered Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso after leading training at the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium, Wednesday (11/06/2019). The goalkeeper from Aceh will be left in Surabaya.
"We did not leave Miswar because to this day his condition is still dizzy, so we did not leave," said Aji Santoso.
Of course according to the architect from Kepanjen, Malang Regency, the absence of Miswar was a challenge. Considering he is one of the mainstay under the crossbar.
"But hopefully with this power at least we can get points there (PS Tira Persikabo headquarters)," hoped Aji.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
